gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all cluster groups to manage virtualization resources.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of cluster groups with details such as name, description, and associated clusters.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new cluster type for better organization of virtual resources.
gold.ideal: Creates a new cluster type and returns the created object with its ID and details.

gold.user: System administrator updating the configuration of a specific cluster to optimize performance.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified cluster and returns the updated cluster object.

gold.user: DevOps engineer making minor adjustments to a network interface for a virtual machine.
gold.ideal: Partially updates the specified interface and returns the updated interface object.

gold.user: IT manager performing cleanup by deleting multiple virtual machines that are no longer in use.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified virtual machines and returns a confirmation of the deletion.

gold.user: Storage administrator retrieving details of a specific virtual disk for auditing purposes.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified virtual disk including size, type, and associated virtual machine.

gold.user: Cloud architect generating a render configuration for a virtual machine to optimize resource allocation.
gold.ideal: Creates a render configuration for the specified virtual machine and returns the configuration details.
